articles.description: The scale of the task awaiting new Manchester United manager Ruben Amorim is made clear in the draw with Chelsea

articles.description: Max Verstappen climbs up from 17th on the grid to win the Sao Paulo Grand Prix, one of his greatest victories taking him to the brink of a fourth world title.
articles.title: Brazilian Grand Prix 2024: Max Verstappen wins from 17th

articles.description: Mohamed Salah’s winner against Brighton, taking Liverpool top of the Premier League table, is a timely reminder of what the Reds could lose if contract talks do not go well.
articles.title: Why Liverpool contract talks for Salah, Van Dijk and Alexander-Arnold are crucial

articles.description: New Zealand seal a historic 3-0 series clean sweep over India with a thrilling 25-run win on day three of the third and final Test at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai.
articles.title: New Zealand complete historic 3-0 series clean sweep of India

articles.description: Man Utd skipper Bruno Fernandes admits he feels responsible for Erik ten Hag's sacking as manager.

articles.description: Chelsea thrash Everton at Goodison Park in the Women's Super League to maintain their perfect start to the season under new boss Sonia Bompastor.
articles.title: Everton 0-5 Chelsea: WSL champions thrash Everton to maintain perfect record

articles.description: England call up Sale Sharks prop Asher Opoku-Fordjour in their 36-player squad preparing to face Australia in the Autumn Nations Series.
articles.title: England: Asher Opoku-Fordjour called up to 36-player squad to face Australia
